title: Graph scatterplot hours of sleep happiness scores

content.question: A research group conducted a study investigating the connection between self-reported number of hours slept in a given week and scores on a happiness measure. Based on the scatterplot above, the group can report that there is

choices.label: no relationship between amount of self-reported sleep and happiness
a perfect, positive relationship between amount of self-reported sleep and happiness

skill.text: 3.C: Interpret quantitative or qualitative inferential data from a given table, graph, chart, figure, or diagram.
